00152 //informations contained in an event
00153 struct ZincEvent
00154 {
00155   int x,y;  // pointer position  none -> 0
00156   int k;    // keycode           none -> 0
00157   long t;   // timestamp         none -> 0
00158   String K; // keysym            none -> "??"
